<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">534ad6883b6e3a10bc1ccdd643e45ac7</macroponent><name>checkbox_choose_people_modal/now_default/checked</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params

function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  const { peopleSysIds } = api.state;
  const peopleSysId = api.item.value._row_data.uniqueValue;
	return peopleSysIds.includes(peopleSysId);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-20 19:43:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>3aa3f13d3ba6b650bc1ccdd643e45a3f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>checkbox_choose_people_modal/now_default/checked</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BOT Application" source="x_1896436_bot_ap_0">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BOT Application">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_3aa3f13d3ba6b650bc1ccdd643e45a3f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-20 19:46:26</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
